{/* Text Section */}

I am a Montreal-based photographer special

As a freelance photographer, he has documented everything from intense sports competitions and energetic nightlife to intimate portraits and editorial work. His passion lies in capturing real, unfiltered moments â€” whether on stage, in the streets, or behind the scenes.

Alexandre's work is rooted in storytelling, shaped by an eye for detail and a strong sense of composition. He draws inspiration from music, architecture, and the raw beauty of everyday life.

When not behind the camera, he curates visual inspiration on his archive Instagram page and collaborates with local artists and student organizations across Montreal.

Notable clients and assignments include:

  • McGill Athletics (Sports Photographer)
  • SSMU & Concordia Student Union Events
  • Montreal Fashion Student Collective (Backstage)
  • Various Montreal DJs and Nightlife Organizers
{/* Contact Note */}

For bookings, collaborations, or inquiries, feel free to reach out at alexstaubinphoto@gmail.com.

{/* Image Section
